description: This file defines an asynchronous function callBackendGenerate to invoke a backend API endpoint for generating content based on a prompt. It constructs the URL from environment variables and performs a fetch POST request, handling errors and logging debugging info in non-production environments.

methods.name: callBackendGenerate(prompt)
methods.description: Asynchronously calls the backend /api/generate endpoint with a prompt, handling URL construction from environment variables, and error handling.
